contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Qatar Foundation’s National Sport Day Healthy Living Instagram Trivia Quiz Competition

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Answer questions about healthy living for the chance to win prizes.

As part of QF’s National Sport Day celebrations, QF is launching an Instagram trivia quiz competition about healthy living.

How to participate:

The competition will be hosted on the QF Instagram page from 8 to 10 February 2015. QF’s followers will be asked multiple choice questions about healthy living.

The competition begins on 8 February 2015 and ends on 10 February 2015.

The competition will be run on QF’s Instagram account (@qatarfoundation).

Questions will be multiple choice. Options will be shared in the caption of the question post. To answer, participants must choose the correct option.

Answers can be given in English or Arabic.

Questions will be posted at 4.30pm.

The first five followers to comment with the correct answer will be declared winners for that day, and will be awarded points as follows:
  • 1st answer: 10 points
  • 2nd answer: 8 points
  • 3rd answer: 6 points
  • 4th answer: 4 points
  • 5th answer: 2 points

Answers will be posted on QF’s website.

There will be one winner announced on 11 February.

Winners will receive prizes and be announced on Instagram, Twitter and the QF website.

Click here for full competition rules and other information.
